page.title: 14RECREATION IN EAST HADDON.
page.content:
VILLAGE FACILITIES The village playing fields, with their modern brick built pavilion are home of the football team and the cricket team. Sadly the majority of the players for each of the teams is drawn from outside the village.
PRIVATE FACILITIES Within the grounds of East Haddon Hall is a private squash club and also a small swimming pool. A number of villagers use the courts together with many more people from Northampton.
Many children are taken by parents to either Northampton or Daventry for swimming and gymnastic clubs. Mini rugby is available in nearby Long Buckby.
